title: Food Delivery
description: Would you like millions of new customers to enjoy your amazing food and groceries? So would we! It's simple: we list your menu and product lists online, help you process orders, pick them up, and deliver them to hungry pandas – in a heartbeat! Interested? Let's start our partnership today!

facility.name: Delivery or Pickup (Takeaway)
facility.details: You can configure to accept both delivery or takeaways orders

facility.name: Distance Restrictions.
facility.details: You can set a maximum delivery distance based on km/miles using Google API’s , design your delivery area set only the postal codes you are delivering too.

facility.name: Automatic or Live Manual Order Acceptance.
facility.details: By default all food orders are automatically accepted. However you have the option to enable the manual Live Accept/Decline option  to accept or reject orders in live mode while the same time you are informing also the customer with the approximate delivery time .

facility.name: Delivery Fee
facility.details: You can also set a fixed Delivery Fee or even dynamic delivery fee based on Distance .Delivery Fee can be also changed using custom filters for more extensibility based on your needs

title: Courier Service
description: Under this service, deliveries are provided at the doorstep of any customers of their daily life to meet their everyday necessities. Please find below the rate chart of regularly delivered item. In the booking mode there are both cash based deliveries in advance and cash based payment upon delivery at site.

title: Book Delivery Service
description: Our mission is to help people find and buy any book from any bookseller and our business stretches around the county. The unique inventory of books for sale from booksellers includes the country’s and world’s finest antiquarian books dating back to the 15th century, countless out-of-print gems, millions of signed books, millions of used copies, a vast selection of college textbooks and new books too.
